instructions: Check that Wi-Fi and Smartphone Mobile Hotspot are turned off. From any Home screen, tap the Applications icon. Scroll to and tap Settings . Scroll to 'WIRELESS & NETWORKS' and tap More . Tap Mobile network sharing . Tap Mobile Hotspot settings . If necessary, read the message and tap OK . Edit the 'ROUTER NAME (SSID)' field as necessary. If desired, select one of the following options in the 'SECURITY' field: None WEP (128) WPA (TKIP) WPA2 (AES) If desired, tap the Password text entry field to change the password. Tap Manage users . Verify the Allowed users only check box is not selected. Tap Done . Press Back . Select or clear the Mobile Hotspot check box.
From any Home screen, tap the Applications icon. Scroll to and tap Settings . Scroll to 'WIRELESS & NETWORKS' and tap More . Tap Mobile network sharing . Select or clear the Mobile Hotspot check box.
